name: Doremi
0:
”Alexa, open doh reh mi”
”Play a C sharp”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: doh reh mi
des: Use "Do re mi" to listen and learn music notes. This simple skill plays the notes of the 4th octave as if they were played by a piano. The 4th octave is where A 440 Hz is located, which is the usual note used to tune instruments.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
